en: I want something to kill aliens
I'm going to do a hold up
I need something from the ammunation store!
Daddy, will you get me a pistol as a birthday present...
I want you to by me a colossal and shinny riffle
Leave right now and never come back unless you bring back an M16 with you.
Take few G36 with you, just in case...
Tell mom not to forget the M16 at the local hillbilly market!
